alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Marshall; Northern Kosciusko; Southern Kosciusko (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fulton, Kosciusko and southeastern Marshall Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Argos, or 10 miles north of Rochester, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported half inch hail near Culver and Burr Oak. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mentone around 620 PM EDT. Warsaw and Winona Lake around 630 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pierceton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Fulton; Marshall; Northern Kosciusko; Southern Kosciusko
